original_text:
To the woman he said,
“I will make your pains in childbearing very severe;
    with painful labor you will give birth to children.
Your desire will be for your husband,
    and he will rule over you.”
korean_text: 또 여자에게 이르시되 내가 네게 임신하는 고통을 크게 더하리니 네가 수고하고 자식을 낳을 것이며 너는 남편을 원하고 남편은 너를 다스릴 것이니라 하시고

sentences.original_text: I will make your pains in childbearing very severe
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너의 출산 고통을 매우 심하게 만들 것이다

sentences.original_text: with painful labor you will give birth to children
sentences.korean_translation: 고통스러운 노동으로 너는 자녀를 낳을 것이다

sentences.original_text: Your desire will be for your husband
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 소원은 너의 남편을 향할 것이다

sentences.original_text: and he will rule over you
